``` {r, echo=F, warning=F}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

include_graphics("TIDAL.png")
```

# TIDAL Interaction Variable

For more information, see the [TIDAL GitHub page](https://github.com/AmeliaES/TIDAL)

Date generated: `r Sys.Date()`

## Split trajectories by condition

Phenotype: `r params$phenotype`
Condition: `r params$cond`
Type: `r params$condType`
Formula: `r params$condModelForm`

Condition plot

``` {r, echo = F}

params$condPlot

```

### Fixed effects

```{r, echo=F}
kbl(params$condFixed[,3:ncol(condFixed)], digits = 3)  %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position")
```


### Random effects

```{r, echo=F}
kbl(params$condRandom[,3:ncol(params$condRandom)], digits = 3)  %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position")
```


### Scores at certain ages

Plot
``` {r, echo = F}

params$plotScore

```


Table
```{r, echo=F}
kbl(params$tableScore[,3:ncol(params$tableScore)], digits = 3)  %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position")
```



### AUC

Plot
``` {r, echo = F}

params$AUCplot

```


Table
```{r, echo=F}
kbl(params$AUCtable[,3:ncol(params$AUCtable)], digits = 3)  %>%
```
